website_summaries.verdict: The Nike SB Bruin Hyperfeel exhibits an enhanced skating performance thanks to the Hyperfeel technology. The well-blended combination of superb fit, effective cushioning, and flexible outsole make the Nike SB Bruin Hyperfeel an outstanding pair to skate on.This shoe definitely has a precise board feel that the Swoosh unashamedly brags about. Nike just formulated a cutting-edge skate shoe and it’s worth trying and buying. Moreover, the looks and style of the shoe make it doubly hard to resist.
pros: The topnotch suede upper of the Nike SB Bruin Hyperfeel was commended by many users
Available in the market at an affordable price
This pair generally runs true to size
Most of the users felt the stable and firm cushioning of the Nike SB Bruin Hyperfeel
This pair exhibits an exceptional board feel, noted most users
Many users said that this sneaker has enough protection from impact
Several thrashers observed the lowered, yet well-cushioned heel counter that allows maximum range of motion
It is offered in the market in multiple colorways
The slim shape of this sneaker was applauded by many skateboarding enthusiasts
cons: Some users complained about the uncomfortable arch support
The Nike SB Bruin Hyperfeel has a poor ventilation, said a few critics
The durability of the outsole is not exceptional, observed by some

customer_reviews.title: Over-engineered for your discomfort...
customer_reviews.text: The style is OK. They are good looking shoes. But the insoles are so thick and uncomfortable. I wear a D or M width size 12 with most shoes. These felt tight when I tried them on. Went against my first impression to return them. It seems in the process of making the Bruin a "skate" shoe (originally the design was court and they were very comfortable) they stuffed thick silicone insoles in the Bruin line. I got a blister when I wore them with the original insoles. . I had to replace the insoles just to get more room in them. Much more comfortable now, but have to wait for my blister to heal before I wear them again.
customer_reviews.author: Vince Tinebra

customer_reviews.title: I like them though
customer_reviews.text: Well, they're skateboard shoes, so I should have expected them to be a bit tight. Once on they're ok. Not so tight to be uncomfortable. The skateboard shoes they made in the 90's fit much looser, and that's what I was going for. I gave 5 stars because it's not the merchant's fault I overlooked something. I like them though, and the shipping was fast. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really like these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shoes... however, they are VERY narrow and snug. At first, I couldn't even get my foot in the shoe. But they I completely unlaced and re-laced them, keeping the laces as loose as possible, and I got them on. I only wear them a couple of hours at a time, and they are pretty comfortable as long as I keep them laced very loosely. I don't think going up a size would help, it's more of a narrowness issue.
customer_reviews.author: Nicky P

customer_reviews.title: After a day they loosened up and are pretty comfortable. The sole bubbled up within a week ...
customer_reviews.text: Shoes were really tight and barely fit, I almost sent them back. After a day they loosened up and are pretty comfortable. The sole bubbled up within a week and they are they squeak worse than any shoe I have owned. Are these real or knockoffs?
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: good durable shoes !!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these shoes for my brother. He loves them. Great skateboarding shoes. He Skated with them for 6 months and still no holes in them. Really good performance on the skateboard. and look really stylish as well !
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Cool sneakers. Great color. Fit nicely. Would definitely recommend to anyone thinking of buying them. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nmartin

customer_reviews.title: wake up Nike and made it right
customer_reviews.text: shoe looks good but is very uncomfortable, they could have put a more flexible sole material and more cushion in the shoe it's like walking on a piece of solid wood. will never buy again
customer_reviews.author: John C. OConnell

customer_reviews.title: SO NICE!! Got them as a birthday gift for ...
customer_reviews.text: SO NICE!! Got them as a birthday gift for my boyfriend and he loves them! He's usually a 10.5 so I was nervous but got the 10 and they got perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: The box they were received in looked like someone spilled cooking oil on it
customer_reviews.text: Shoes were very small. I went to try the left shoe on, and the company shipped me two right shoes. The box they were received in looked like someone spilled cooking oil on it. Needless to say since I have a left and a right foot, I sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: James Lorelli

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe, but mine had a large flaw.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are comfy, I do enjoy them and they look great. Downside, within one month, the tread came lose from the actual shoe, so there is now a bubble between tread and shoe, and the air now squeaks out of that said bubble when walking. I have never had that happen before. I've had them for 1 month, and had to send them back. I work at a desk job, I mean, its not like I've even worn them in....
customer_reviews.author: Patrick M. St John

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Fit smaller than I expected, narrower than I thought they would be, otherwise, they fit fine, are comfortable and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Roberts

customer_reviews.title: The elastic band inside that holds the tongue down is like 4 inches wide
customer_reviews.text: Mine were uncomfortable. The elastic band inside that holds the tongue down is like 4 inches wide. It overlapped near where my big toe was and created quite a bit of discomfort. But all in all they looked better in person then in the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Savvy

customer_reviews.title: Great price, nice style...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my son, he loves the fit and says they have good grip - he's really hard on shoes so these were a great price considering how often we but skate shoes. I like the style of the, very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Julia Cook

customer_reviews.title: Buy 1 size bigger
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoes, but they run small. Had to return them and was not able to get them in a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Erica G.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit small at first but they break in like the. First few days
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: Fast Shipping, arrived in original Nike box. Great comfortable shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Soles make it a bit small
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were pretty much as I expected, but they did feel small upon first trying them on. Then again, I do have wide and flat feet, so that may be it. My solution was just switching out the soles these came with and put old ones from another pair of Janoskis. Fit WAY better afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort! Love them
customer_reviews.text: my 2nd pair of Bruins Hyperfeel-great fit! Great comfort! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Buy these shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are super stylish. I enjoy them, even if they are a little tight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe. Skates good
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe. Skates good. Fits a bit tight until broken in. Need to lace/unlace each time to put them on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them so much that I bought them in the light color!!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel D. Cozart

customer_reviews.title: Classic
customer_reviews.text: Shoe looks great right out of the box and on the feet. Snug fit around the middle of the foot as designed so they won't slip off your feet while skating. Super comfortable and skate good as well. If they hold up a few weeks of skating Id give them a 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Jason Willis

customer_reviews.title: wOrth the money
customer_reviews.text: is a little bigger than most Nike sbs but it's a great shoe nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes. I love skate shoes so these were ...
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. I love skate shoes so these were great for me. Look great, feel great, quality is great. Thumbs up from me.
customer_reviews.author: Accurate Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are a little stiff, but fit and will break in.
customer_reviews.author: Josiah

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: comfy shoes, love the color. may buy a second pair
customer_reviews.author: kai K.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is a great looking shoe, but the good stops there. These fit terribly, and are very uncomfortable. I think Nike used a different species other than people for their design of this shoe. Forget skating in them, they're bad enough just for walking. I bought these as a replacement for my Kostons, which I should've just bought another pair of.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny E.

product_meta.title: Nike SB Bruin Hyperfeel Mens Trainers 831756 Sneakers Shoes
